    • Method Detail

      • welcome

        public void welcome(java.lang.String type,
                    int portOrIp)
        This method is responsible for shows a welcome message when the user starts the program. It receives a type or version of turbo fire, slave or master and a port to shows the user.
        Parameters:
        type - The turbo fire version (Slave or Master).
        portOrIp - Information for shows to the user.

      • showSkull

        public void showSkull()
        This method only shows to the user a skull by ASCII art.

      • clean

        public static void clean()
        This method is reponsible for cleaning the console. It uses a bash code for to do clean the console.

      • getCommand

        public java.lang.String[] getCommand()
        This method returns a command entered by the user for the method caller.
        Returns:
        String[] String array with all arguments entered by the user.

      • errorMessage

        public static void errorMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        This method is responsible for shows to the user a error message received by parameter.
        Parameters:
        msg - A error message.

      • help

        public static void help()
        This mehtod helps the user kk.

      • showMessage

        public static void showMessage(java.lang.String msg)
        This method only shows to the user a simple system message.
        Parameters:
        msg - A text message from system.

      • newClient

        public static void newClient(java.lang.String clientAddress)
        This method is responsible for shows a new client connected.
        Parameters:
        clientAddress - The zombie client IP address.

      • showActiveZoombie

        public void showActiveZoombie(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> zombies)
        This method lists all active zombie clients connected.
        Parameters:
        zombies - The arraylist with all zombies IP address.

      • pressEnterToContinue

        public void pressEnterToContinue()
        This is a simple method that is called for get a enter key input from user.

      • showExceptionLog

        public static void showExceptionLog(java.lang.String exception)
        This method formats a java runtime exception.
        Parameters:
        exception - Java exception to string.

      • showAttackActivity

        public static void showAttackActivity(int amount,
                                      java.util.List logs,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> hosts,
                                      AttackPattern attackPattern)
        This method shows the DDOS operation in real-time.
        Parameters:
        amount - A integer shot amount.
        logs - The attack patterns receveid by zombies response.
        hosts - The java array list object with all ip address.
        attackPattern - The attack pattern object.
